resources.string: Thank you for using the Discover Glen Oak app. We\'d like to ask a few questions about your experience.
How would you rate this app?
Finally, what would you like to tell us about your experience with this app that has not been covered above?
Have you recently visited the town of Oak Glen?
How would you rate your visit?
How would you say this app enhanced your visit?
First, we\'d like to get an idea of who is using this app. What is your age?

An important part of this discovery app\'s experience is the ability to connect to CIM EDUCATIONAL BEACONS. When you reach a specific photo location the app will automatically stream fun and educational content to your smart devices. This feature depends on specific secure wi-fi beacons, which have been strategically placed in specific locations. In order to automatically connect to these beacons, the Android system permissions to Access and Change Wi-Fi state, as well as to receive coarse location information, are required.\n\n To enable the CIM EDUCATIONAL BEACONS feature, please turn on Wi-Fi Auto-Connect from the app\'s menu, and accept the permissions if prompted. If you have permanently denied the permissions (by selecting the \"Never ask again\" checkbox), then you can re-enable them through your device\'s settings.

string-array.name: visitedOptions
string-array.item: No, but I plan to soon
No, and I don\'t plan to

resources.string:
Welcome to beautiful Oak Glen, California and thank you for your purchase of the “Oak Glen Discovery eAdventure”. A fun and adventurous way to discover “The Glen”.
 
 Start your Journey:
 Your adventure begins when you either “tap”
a map will be displayed with your current location and “pins” that represent the locations of the hidden photo items. Tap on a pin and follow the map to the selected location.\n \n
a gallery of photographs will be displayed. Tap on a photo and the map will launch with guidance to the location of the selected item.\n \n

Reach your Destination:
 When you reach a destination look for the “Pop-up” text on your device for educational information and fun facts about the destination object.
 
 At some destinations, the app will automatically stream fun and educational (location specific) content to your smart device.
 
 Keep Score:
 Once you reach a destination a “Red Apple” will appear in the corner of the photo on your device. A “Red Apple” will also be added to the Main Page of this app. Locate all the Photo destinations and you may receive a valuable bonus!
 
 One important note: As you travel to your chosen location the map on your device will display the shortest, straight line, route. PLEASE STAY ON DESIGNATED PATHS AND ROADWAYS! Though the “straight line” path may be tempting it is important that you respect the area through which you are trekking.
 
 
 “Happy Travels”,
 
 Cyrano
